text: Paciencia, also known as Filipino meringue galyetas or galletas paciencia, are Filipino cookies made with beaten egg whites, flour, and calamansi. They are typically hemispherical in shape. The name means "patience" in Spanish. They are traditionally eaten during the Christmas Season. ==See also== *Linga cookie *Broas *Christmas cookie * List of cookies *Monde Nissin *Roscas *Rosquillo == References == Category:Philippine cuisine Category:Cookies
title: Paciencia (cookie)
